pageProps.title: Welcome to the Blog
pageProps.content:
This is an example article written in Markdown.

- You can write lists
- **Bold** or _italic_ text
- Add [links](https://nextjs.org)

> Markdown makes writing content easy and fun!

Enjoy blogging!
pageProps.summary: A quick introduction to this blog, explaining Markdown formatting and basic features. Learn how to create rich content easily using various Markdown syntax elements.
